sections.heading: Children in foster care and kinship foster care; rights8-529
sections.text: Children in foster care and kinship foster care; rightsA. A child in foster care and kinship foster care has the following rights:1. To appropriate care and treatment in the least restrictive setting available that can meet the child's nee
